hero.title: Trusted Medical Tourism Facilitation for International Patients
hero.subtitle: MedEminence is a medical tourism facilitation platform that assists international patients in accessing timely, coordinated healthcare services through accredited hospitals and licensed medical professionals in India.

about.problemHeadline: MedEminence is a medical tourism facilitation and healthcare coordination platform focused on assisting international patients seeking treatment in India.
about.problemDescription: We work as a non-clinical intermediary, supporting patients throughout their healthcare journey by coordinating with accredited hospitals, licensed medical professionals, and trusted healthcare service providers. Our role is to simplify complex cross-border healthcare processes by offering structured coordination, transparent communication, and logistical support.

services.title: Our Services
services.headline: Comprehensive healthcare coordination and travel support for international patients

caseReview.title: Medical Case Review Coordination
caseReview.desc: We assist patients in securely sharing medical reports and treatment requirements with appropriate hospitals and licensed specialists for review.

hospitalMatch.title: Hospital & Specialist Identification
hospitalMatch.desc: Based on the patient's medical needs, we coordinate with accredited hospitals and qualified medical professionals.

cost.title: Travel Planning Support
cost.desc: Assistance with flight planning, airport transfers, and local transportation related to treatment travel.

visa.title: Accommodation Coordination
visa.desc: Support in arranging accommodation near hospitals for patients and accompanying family members.

travel.title: Local Assistance During Stay
travel.desc: On-ground coordination including hospital navigation assistance and logistical support.

care.title: Post-Treatment Follow-Up Coordination
care.desc: Assistance with sharing medical reports and coordinating follow-up consultations after discharge.

cta.title: Take The First Step
cta.headline: Ready for Timely Medical Care?
cta.description: Don't let waiting lists delay your treatment. Share your medical details with us, and our team will provide a personalized treatment plan, connect you with the right specialists, and handle all logistics for your medical journey abroad.

india.title: Why Choose India?
india.desc: India has emerged as a global healthcare destination due to its combination of advanced medical infrastructure, experienced healthcare professionals, and internationally accredited hospitals.
points: Efficient care pathways compared with many regions
Multilingual medical teams and international patient departments
